name: Integrity
description:
Integrity is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game in which players interact in a world of absolute freedom. You can be a criminal, businessman, police officer or anything inbetween. The actions of players determine your fate and the fate of your pursuit of wealth, glory and power.
The game world is planned to be an enormous 200km2, which will not only be large but will have everything from cities to beautiful beaches and farmland, to snow-capped mountains and everything inbetween.
You will be able to buy and sell almost every building and item in the game, and trade with other players for profit. You will be able to customise your character to your liking and even decorate your house.
Overall Integrity, once finished, will be an expansive and brilliant game with hundreds of hours of fun to be had!
